sir-bearington.description: Step into the paws of Sir Bearington, a brave bear with one dream - to become a knight. Serving under the newly crowned King Moosington, you’ll take on quests, battle dangerous foes, and rise in power as you fight for your place in the kingdom. But not all is as it seems. The deeper you go, the clearer it becomes: Moosington’s rule hides dark intentions. To save the land, Sir Bearington must rise above his oath and challenge the crown itself. He won’t face this journey alone - by his side stands the cunning and loyal Corgnilious, ready to help turn the tide.

keyFeatures.title: Epic Quests & Boss Fights
keyFeatures.description: Hunt for loot, take on mighty foes, and grow stronger with every victory.

keyFeatures.title: Deep Character Customization
keyFeatures.description: Build your bear your way. Choose between magical power, protective magic armor, or brute physical strength with melee combat and heavy armor.

keyFeatures.title: Progression That Matters
keyFeatures.description: Gain talent points, forge unique builds, and adapt your playstyle to every challenge.

keyFeatures.title: A Story of Loyalty and Betrayal
keyFeatures.description: Discover the truth about Moosington’s rule and decide the fate of the kingdom.

updates.title: Quest Icons Update
changes: Added quest complete icon
Added quest Available icon
Added new script QuestIconHandler that will handle the icons
QuestState: enum showing the state quests are in
QuestPanelHandler now sets QuestState to InProgress when player starts quest
QuestIconHandler now shows correct icon to indicate if a quest is complete, in progress, or available
KillQuest now sets State to Completed when condition is met

updates.title: Loot Table Update
changes: Unique loot drop table now has a base drop chance, this will dictate if items drop at all

updates.title: Item and Resource Balance
changes: Mana cost for abilities will scale based on players INT
Player now has armor scaling which redued damage taken. 1point = 1% damage reduction against enemies of same level
bugFixes: Fixed bug where healing ability was trying to access an object that didnt exist

updates.title: Loot Update
changes: Added EntityUniqueLootTable to enemies that will only drop 1 item from a list
Added EntityLootTable which rolls on every item in the list
Added Killable script, its responsible for containing the onDeath callback

updates.title: Screen Error SCT
changes: UI now shows if the player doesnt have enough mana
UI now shows if the player doesnt have a target

updates.title: Equipped weapon placement
changes: Equipped staffs are now on the players back not in hand

updates.title: Github Actions
changes: Added Github actions to create ticket  in website board to track version changes

updates.title: Player Stats Cleanup
changes: Added GetPlayerStats to PlayerScript so there is a way to get player stats

sub: Enemy now checks if player is dead, and stops attacking/following
GameReferences now track spawn locations and has a playerDied callback function
PlayerInfoHandler now handles respawning the player

updates.title: Tooltips
changes: Tooltips now have an item level text
Main menu version text is now automatically updated
Added item level calculation to equipment

updates.title: Christmas Update
changes: Updated the main menu to be more festive

updates.title: Target Selection Outline
changes: Nameplates now have a yellow border around them when the enemy is selected

updates.title: Gameplay Revamp & Tab Targetting
changes: Changed the way the player camera works, instead of locking it ot the cursor, you now have to hold left click to pan, left + right click to move in the direction like an mmorpg
Abilities arent aimed anymore, instead the player can now click on enemeis and target them
Added UI frame to show what enemy the player is targetting
Added the ability to tab target nearby enemies

updates.title: XP & Damage Changes
changes: Staff FireBall base damage: 10 -> 25
Enemy XP formula: 45 + 5*level -> 95 + 5*level

updates.title: New Quest System
changes: Added a golden frog quest giver
Added quests that quest giver can give
Added UI element to see active quests on the screen
Added UI element where you can select what quest to pick up from NPC

updates.title: Level System Changes
changes: Adjusted XP from enemies. Was: HP = XP now: 5*lvl + 45
Player XP required formula changed
Added a new equipment item: Uncommon Mage Hat. Drops from enemies with a low drop chance

updates.title: New Equipment Stats
changes: Reduced max level from 50 -> 20
Updated Wooden Staff stats to use the new stats system
Reduced STR to +1/lvl
Reduced INT to +1/lvl
Removed armor stat

updates.title: New Ability Update
changes: Added logic to create castable abilities
Added a new cast bar UI element
Added new ability: BlackHole

updates.title: Inventory System Revamp
changes: Player can now drag and drop items around the inventory
Drag and drop things out of inventory
Drag and drop onto cahracter panel to equip items
Replaced Wooden Staff icon
Added Warlock Talent Tree
Added first warlock ability DeathBolt, a single target ability that applies a DoT on impact

updates.title: Main Menu Update

sub: Added game version text bottom right
Added idle Sir Bearington holding 2 swords
Enemy levels will now be colored
Enemies 10 levels or higher will not show level instead will show ??
Enemies 6-9 levels higher than player will be red
Enemies 3-5 levels higher than player will be orange
Enemmies within 2 levels of player will be yellow
Enemies 3-9 levels lower than player will be green
Enemies 10 levels lower than player will be gray

bugFixes: Fixed bug where dragging ability from talent tree somewhere other than actionbar caused it to get stuck and cause errors
Fixed bug where placing an ability on actionbar with an ability already there caused the actionbar slot to contain both abilities
Fixed bug where having 2 or more of the same ability would only show the cooldown on the main instance of the ability

sub: Enemies cant drop rare or higher quality loot anymore
Chest starts with a common sword and a common staff
Common Wooden Staff INT reduced from 7 -> 3
Common Wooden Staff damage reduced from 12 -> 5

updates.title: Passive Talents
changes: Added passive talents, they can increase player stats (armor / strength / intellect) or change ability stats (dmg/CD/Mana cost)
Updated Mage talent tree
Updated Priest talent tree
Added tooltips to passive talents

updates.title: New Character Scene
changes: Added new Player Scene, contains player and game manager object. Now player will nto be despawned when entering other maps
bugFixes: Fixed bug where going to man menu and back into game would cause reference to talent text to be broken because callback was never removed
UpdateMana and UpdateHealth now check if callbacks are null
Added logic to loading scene to stop tiem while scenes are loading. Player was falling through the ground because player would load before the world

updates.title: Player Stats & XP Update
changes: Max level for player updated: 20 -> 50
Enemy now take reduced damage if higher level than player
Enemies now take increaesd damage if lower level than player
Added common tier mage hat
Updated enemy loot table
New Floating Combat Text (XP), which now spawns when player gets XP
Enemies give reduced XP if they are 5levels or lower than the player
Updated Mana regen for player. Was 3%/2s -> (5+(INT/2))/2sec
Updated HP regen for player. was 3%/2s -> (5+(STR/2))/2sec
Player now starts with 500 mana was 200
Both HP and Mana scale using 500 * 1.055^(lvl-1)
STR and INT now provide 1% to max HP and max INT per point respectively
bugFixes: Fixed healing potion starting count at 0 in inventory
Fixed coins starting count at 5857 in inventory

updates.title: New Ability
changes: Added FireRain an AOE ability that spawns meteors that land on enemies doing damage
Moved check for cooldown and instantiation to ability SO
MagicAbilityScript (FireballScript) does not do math for damage anymore, ability SO does
Refactored Ability SO, it now has references to playerStats, ability Icon and cooldown. It also tries casting and sets itself to be on CD
Added TalentSlotHandler which automatically fills in icons, abilities and other things required for the talent slot to work
bugFixes: Fixed bug where abilities did more damage than they should have
Fixed bug where in the build it wouldn't show ability cooldowns

updates.title: Bug fixes
changes: Added in-game debugger console
bugFixes: Fixed bug where all dropped items were retained in the manager scene
Fixed bug where loading screen was open after loading the WorldScene in build

updates.title: Wooden Staff Update
changes: Refactored logic for beams, beams now are handled by the ScriptableObject
Wooden staff now has additional rarities: Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary
Added a Quit button to the main menu

updates.title: XP Changes & New Staff
changes: MageHat stats update: Int 150 -> 35
Staff of Jordan Damage and INT 5 -> 35
Added new Wooden Staff of common rarity
Updated amount of xp dropped from enemies. XP now scales with enemy HP
Adjusted player XP required to be more inline with new XP drops from enemies
bugFixes: Fixed bug where XP bar showed 'New Text' before getting XP
Fixed interactable not set for DroppedStartingSword

updates.title: Bug Fixes
changes: Updated enemy HP scaling with a new formula. Under level 8 they will have less hp, over level 8 will have more
bugFixes: Fixed bug where tooltips were misplaced in the build of the game. They were offset from the mouse position, and didnt correctly track movement
Fixed bug where talent tree icons would reduce in size everytime the player would drag an ability to the actionbar. Only occured during the build of the game
Fixed bug where ScrollingCombatText would spawn below the ground when enemies were on hills
Fixed bug where enemies with more than 500hp would not correctly display hp and would require a hit to update

updates.title: Enemy Spawner Overhaul
changes: Added spawners all over the map
Enemies de-spawn when far enough from the player
Spawners only activate when near the player
Added FPS counter
bugFixes: Addressed an issue where if a Fireball missed an enemy and flew off it would never despawn. Now Fireball projectiles get destroyed after 30sec

updates.title: Talent Tree Update
changes: Added talent pages, now the talent tree will be split into classes with their own pages
Talents are now locked by default and require a talent point to unlock
Player now gains a talent point every level

updates.title: UI Scene Implemented
changes: Removed references to QuantityBhv
Added Main Menu button from the pause UI
Implemented UI scene that now works

updates.title: Minor UI Update
changes: Moved GameManager into UI scene

updates.title: UI Healthbar Update
changes: Removed the use of minimalist asset bars, added my own custom UI bars to allow to split the UI into its own scene
Replaced HP, Mana, XP bars with my own custom ones

updates.title: Scene Update
changes: Added a way to pass a list of scenes to load
Added UI scene

updates.title: Additive Scene Update
changes: Added a first loading scene, the first scene that loads before main menu
Added a loading scene, this is called between scene changes
Added a way to load scenes with scene names
Updated project settings, added company, version, and product name

updates.title: Main Menu Update
changes: Created a Main Menu
Updated README.md to include the trello board

updates.title: Tooltips Update
changes: Added tooltips to items and abilities
Refactored interaction to allow Interactable class to be inherited

updates.title: Abilities and Ability Cooldowns
changes: Abilities now show cooldown on the actionbar
Added a new ability that heals the player. It scales with INT, spawns Scrolling Combat Text, and has an effect

updates.title: Pause Menu & Window Handling Update
changes: Talents cant be open when character and inventory UI is
Cant open Talents, Character UI, or inventory when paused. Will automatically close pause menu
Enemies damage scales with levels
Updated pause menu UI

updates.title: Enemies Update
changes: Enemies attack when they get close to the player

updates.title: Dropped Item Template
changes: Added a dropped template
Added a starting sword
Added a mana flask asset

updates.title: Item Lifespans & Enemy Update
changes: Items that are dropped now have a timer before they get removed from the world
Enemies code was refactored and now have armor and levels

updates.title: UI Update & Mana Use
changes: Updated UI to use new bars
Implemented mana, health and mana regen
Abilities now use mana

updates.title: New Healthbar assets
changes: Added a healthbar asset pack to improve UI visuals
Abilities now duplicate wehn dragged from the talent tree, allowing the player ot have multiple on the action bars (still share cooldown)
created OnTop object that can be used to force UI elements to be on top of everything else

updates.title: Partial Ability Implementation
changes: Added ActionBar class
Added TalentTree class
Updated MagicAbilityScript class
Added drag and drop

updates.title: Viking helmet fix & Spawns
changes: Added more enemy spawn points
Added viking helmet to loot table for enemies
bugFixes: Fixed stats bug
Fixed homing bug

updates.title: Ability & Armor Update
changes: Added a viking helmet as an equippable item
Added a fireball ability to test out the architecture for abilities
bugFixes: Fixed bug where changing weapons causes next weapon to attack
Fixed bug where swapping weapons mid animation locked the staff to always be on cooldown

updates.title: UI & Enemy Update
changes: Added Thunderfury as an item to the game
Added aggro range to the enemies, so when the player is in range they get targeted
bugFixes: Fixed bug where you could hit aggro range of the enemy with spells and melee
Fixed bug where unpausing with escape would keep inventory UI active

updates.title: Weapon Update
changes: Added a multiweapon system
Weapons now control what attack the player does when left clicking
staff of jordan now shoots a fire ball

updates.title: Bug Fixes & Weapon Update
changes: Added sword as a drop item
Added staff and sword icons
bugFixes: Fixed bug where staff of jordan was massive
Fixed bug that prevented the player from unequipping items

updates.title: Scrolling Combat Text
changes: Added scrolling combat text to the game

updates.title: Updated Equiping System
changes: Player can now equip items

updates.title: Rarity Outline Inventory Update
changes: Added rarity outlines for items in the inventory

updates.title: Inventory Update
changes: Cleaned up the project
Inventory now is able to handle stackable and unstackable items

updates.title: Inventory System
changes: Added an inventory system to the game

updates.title: Font Update
changes: Updated the font to feel more unique

updates.title: Equipable Hat
changes: Added a mage hat the player can pickup and equip

updates.title: Pause Screen & New Loot
changes: Added a pause screen that pauses the game
Added a dropped legendary staff

updates.title: Loot Beams
changes: Added loot beams to the game, will be used for dropped loot to indicate loot rarity

updates.title: Added a chest and an interactiable
changes: Added a chest with floating text above it, when the player is near it

changes: Added a nav mesh to the game, allowing AI to move around the game world

updates.title: Rendering pipeline updated
changes: Updated the rendering pipeline to use URP - improving visuals
Added grass to the game

updates.title: Added enemies with health bars
changes: Added enemies to the game, with health bars above their heads

updates.title: Added Trees
changes: Created a world with trees
bugFixes: testing bug fixes 1
testing bug fixes 2

updates.title: Project Started
changes: Project was reacted. General idea of the game was formed

moose-mysteries.fullDescription: The pines hold secrets, and Detective Antlers is the only one who can sniff them out. Moose Mysteries is a point-and-click adventure game blending classic noir atmosphere with quirky woodland humor. Explore hand-drawn environments, gather clues from local wildlife, and solve the mystery of the Missing Maple Syrup. Every choice you make impacts the forest ecosystem.

updates.title: Forest expansion
changes: Opened the 'Maple Grove' area for exploration
Implemented a new dialogue system with wildlife
Visual overhaul of the inventory UI

bean-counter.fullDescription: Forget gold and silver—in this world, coffee beans are the only currency that matters. Bean Counter is a deck-building roguelike where your combat power is determined by your economic prowess. Play your cards right to invest in futures, dodge taxes from the Caffeine King, and build a trading empire from a single burlap sack.

updates.title: Initial Brew
changes: First playable prototype launched
Basic market fluctuation mechanics implemented
3 starter bean classes added (Light, Medium, Dark Roast)
